results.name: Duckman: Graphic Adventures of a Private Dick

requirements_ru.recommended: Pentium II 266, 64 Мб, Glide, Direct3D 6, OpenGL

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: intel or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98, 2000, ME or XP (Windows 95 not supported)
  • Processor: 400 MHz Intel Pentium III or equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
